Huh? No la not BOV. It is Compressor surge.It happens airflow to the intake manifold is low as you off throttle and the throttle body is now closed  but the air pressure from the turbo is high. Now this high air pressure should go somewhere  but there is no way to move forward. So this air pressure tries to escape back through the turbo making the stustustu sound  as the turbo blades are spinning in the opposite direction.
Stomp you for stustustu? Lame leh. Stomp those got back firing one better la
